body_html: Well, you could have a "permutation wrapper" (that takes care of the required ordering) that also keeps track of how many (and which) zeros are. (I don't know whether the current changes already do, I haven't kept up well with that.)

body: Well, you could have a "permutation wrapper" (that takes care of the required ordering) that also keeps track of how many (and which) zeros are. (I don't know whether the current changes already do, I haven't kept up well with that.)
